long_description: Vedauwoo, located in southeastern Wyoming, is a rock climber's paradise that will rock your world! Author: Davin Bagdonos. Softcover; 224 pages; black-and-white photographs, tables and maps. Extreme Angles Publishing; copyright 2005. Located in southeastern Wyoming, Vedauwoo boasts over 1,200 documented climbs and boulder problems. Provides comprehensive information on all of Vedauwoo's boulder problems.
short_description: Vedauwoo, located in southeastern Wyoming, is a rock climber's paradise that will rock your world!
